data.system_settings: iPad 5, iOS 12.1 - Works in normal app mode and splitview
data.actual_result: The server moves 2 servers down and stops
data.short_description: Server that is behind the user profile moves down when you try to move it up
data.steps_to_repro: - Move your server list so that one server is behind the user thing but you can kinda still see It and hold it (see attached pic) - Hold it like you wanna move it - Drag your finger up while holding it
